snippet: Italian football will soon be dying if it does not overcome its deep-rooted structural problems, Juventus president Andrea Agnelli said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Italian Football in Danger of Dying, Says Juve President
headline.main: Italian Football in Danger of Dying, Says Juve President

lead_paragraph: Italian football will soon be dying if it does not overcome its deep-rooted structural problems, Juventus president Andrea Agnelli said on Friday.
